name: David Cornu
bio: David’s misspent youth clicking all the buttons in Microsoft Frontpage and copy-pasting PHP snippets from dubious sources somehow led to a 15+ year career in software engineering and leadership at companies like Shopify and Wealthsimple. He currently works on the developer experience at turbopuffer.
title: Full-text search for busy developers
description: Many applications will eventually get to the point where some form of text search becomes a necessity to let users find what they need in large datasets. In this talk we’ll build a mental model of the techniques and technologies at our disposal, ranging from `LIKE` queries to vector embeddings.
